Date: Thursday, 2/2/1992
Subject: Fan Reaction
Hello Boss,
The fans are not happy that you let Carney Lansford go.
The overall fan interest decreases noticeably.

Sincerly,
Your PR Director

Date: Monday, 5/1/1992
Subject: Progress of Kevin D. Brown
Dear Sir,
Kevin D. Brown is doing pretty good at AA Memphis Redbirds!
He has an ERA of 2.27, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1992
Subject: Status of Brian McRae
Dear Sir,
Brian McRae shouldn't play at AA Memphis Redbirds!
He has an AVG of .194 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director
